data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the country of British Indian Ocean Territory that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the country of British Indian Ocean Territory
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in British Indian Ocean Territory with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the country of British Indian Ocean Territory.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the country of British Indian Ocean Territory who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in British Indian Ocean Territory that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the country of British Indian Ocean Territory.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the country of British Indian Ocean Territory against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.section_summary:
the country of British Indian Ocean Territory has a population of 3,000.

We estimate British Indian Ocean Territory has 1,015 people who might know Jesus, 1,372 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 613 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
